original_title: Drummers Call: America's Fife and Drum Tradition
overview: Drummers Call: America's Fife and Drum Tradition is a documentary resonating the rich history of military field music. Learn about the honored place of fifing and drumming in the U.S. Army today and discover why corps from around the country descend upon Deep River, Connecticut each year.
title: Drummers Call: America's Fife and Drum Tradition
